name: cathtml.sh
labels: script bash html cat concatenate composite kindle
short_description:
This is a script which produces an intermediate composite HTML document.

The script expects the main html file in the local directory index.html

 It will concatinate other HTML files in the order they appear in index.html

** Development of this script has been stopped, and it will not be supported.  The script, since it is a script, does not work properly in many cases.  Use at your own risk, or perhaps just to spur your ideas ;) **
summary: This is a script which produces a composite HTML document.
